name: Hunt Duck - Ooo,Dog Can Fly?
description:
FEATURES
13 Kinds of Weapons: hunting rifle、shotgun、machine gun、rocket launcher...
26 kinds of ducks: Space Duck、Mini duck、Zombie duck、Stealth duck、High-speed duck、Skull duck……
16 kinds of dogs:Jet Dog、Rocket Dog、Big ears Dog、and Superman……
4 Kinds of Modes: Duck Hunt Mode、Dog Hunt Mode,Crazy Duck Mode and Crazy Flying Dog Mode,Challenge mode of level 100 stages,continuously updated...
6 Kinds of Maps: "field"、"cemetery"、"Snow"、"Desert"、"outer space","maya 2012",continuously updated...
